title: Crypto could be used for financing terror, money laundering: Finance minister - Hindustan Times
content:
1. Crypto could be used for financing terror, money laundering: Finance minister  Hindustan Times
  2. Money laundering and terror financing are biggest risks posed by crypto: Finance minister  Moneycontrol
  3. Biggest Risk Of Crypto Is Laundering, Terror Financing: Finance Minister  NDTV Profit
  4. Biggest risk of cryptocurrency could be money laundering, its use for financing terror: Sitharaman in US  India TV News
  5. Money Laundering & Terror Financing Biggest Concerns Around Cryptocurrency, Says FM Nirmala Sitharaman  Indiatimes.com
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: The Union Minister reached Washington today morning on an official visit to attend the Spring Meetings at the World Bank, the G20 Finance Ministers meeting and the Central Bank Governor Meeting (FMCBG).
